programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on another journey around the country to discover how the railways have affected people and communities, and the legacy they left. The first leg of a journey through north-west England begins in Carlisle, where investigates the Victorian appetite for the custard cream, before braving a perilous descent into the only operational slate mine in England and discovering a miniature railway

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey through the Lake District, where he discovers a magical world of talking rabbits, ducks, hedgehogs and mice, who have entertained children for more than 100 years. At the village home of author and illustrator Beatrix Potter, he learns about her legacy and her fears about the railways. Michael presses on to Brantwood, home of the Victorian art critic, John Ruskin, and finishes with a brief encounter at Carnforth

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey around north-west England by celebrating Victorian trade with the Preston Guild, and then heading to Rochdale to learn about a pioneering movement to improve the lives of working families. The presenter also follows in the tracks of many 19th-century industrial employees who made day trips to Hebden Bridge to walk in the Calder Valley

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo crosses into West Yorkshire to begin the next leg of his journey, visiting the Worth Valley and the home of the three Bronte sisters, who were early investors in the railway industry. He then heads to Oakworth to find out how its station and tracks were used in one of the most popular films ever made, and in Bradford discovers the ways in which 19th-century workers saved to buy a home. The presenter finishes in Halifax, where he learns how the railways contributed to the town's success

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reads the riot act in Preston, and discovers four mill workers were shot dead at a protest in 1842. In Darwen, he traces developments in interior design from wallpaper to paint, before exploring the Victorian industrial landscape of Salford in the paintings on LS Lowry. He finishes his leg of the journey on Kersal Moor, where he discovers the poetry of Edwin Waugh and twists his tongue around the Lancashire dialect

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo tunes into the music of the mills and collieries of Victorian England by joining a brass band in Honley, West Yorkshire, before stopping off in Holmfirth to learn about a tragedy that led to a tourist boom in the town. The presenter then crosses into Derbyshire to pay homage to railway engineer George Stephenson at his resting place in Chesterfield, before concluding his journey at Chatsworth House, which was one of the first stately homes to welcome visitors by rail

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on the first leg of a journey to Leeds, beginning at London's Euston station. programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.desc: Anne Hogarth first fell in love with Lanzarote over a decade ago and now, after several visits to the island since, is looking for a holiday home to enjoy in her retirement. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A rugby player is scanned for spinal damage following a collision during a match, and describes her struggles with mental health issues as she awaits the results. programme.desc: Ed and James bait the hunters into a showdown at Taskmaster House while Nik and Eva taunt them with a public appearance in Leicester Square and on the Heart Radio breakfast show. programme.title: Work on the Wild Side

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three Cardiff couples compete to win 1,000 by throwing the perfect dinner part. First-time hosts Abi and Jake plan an American-themed menu. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the Birmingham suburb of Sutton Coldfield, publican Randy Johnson wants to prove that he can put on more than mediocre pub grub, and tries to impress his guests with a black-tie theme and some interesting culinary techniques - including cooking with bricks. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Lettings agent Sharon Wozniak hosts the fourth party in Sutton Coldfield, Birmingham, and she hopes to impress her guests with a classic West Midlands curry - but some diners are unimpressed by her menu. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Outspoken hairdresser Patrick McMurray hosts the final party in Sutton Coldfield, and prepares a scallop starter and a classic beef Wellington. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Marian and Donald seek a two-bed, two-bathroom property with a sea view in Almucar on Spain's Costa Tropical. Jasmine Harman jets off to help the pair by finding five options for them to choose between

It has bags of period character - which they love - but they want to add their own personality and a modern sense of style. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: A member of the public reports a car veering erratically across the M1 and Karl Jackson and Matt Cooling are sent to investigate. Jason Potts is called to a rush-hour crash on the A50, while Alex Boniface takes the lead in the pursuit of a stolen Audi

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Ant Horsley is one of a team of officers pursuing a car suspected of being linked to the drugs trade, and a high-speed and hazardous chase ensues across the Peak District. programme.desc: Officers swoop on a housing estate searching for suspects involved in a shooting and it needs to be a tightly controlled operation and communication is key between the firearms unit, police helicopters and dog handler Duncan. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Steve is involved in a dangerous high-speed pursuit of a car stolen in a burglary. programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A young girl visits the surgery after hurting her neck when she tried to do a back flip, and doctors treat a first-time mother experiencing excruciating pain in her nipples, Meanwhile, doctors also treat a regular patient who is feeling increasingly depressed after his wife had a miscarriage, and a young woman with suspected irritable bowel syndrome

Dr Ibraheem treats a 25-year-old who has had a nasty accident while out walking his dog, with X-rays showing that he has ripped his shoulder out of joint

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun
programme.desc: Cameras focus on 82-year-old Welsh valley girl Val, now of the Costa del Sol, where her spirit, character and fashion forward wardrobe hit the streets enjoying a walking tour with her close friend and 'silver fox' Alan. Together they share the secrets of their beautiful home town of Mijas

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Letting agent Paul has a tenant in Lancashire who is behind with his rent and won't return any calls, but the situation is much worse than he could possibly have imagined when he heads into the upstairs bedroom. Harrow enforcement officers Andrew and Ozge are called to a local salon, where a leak from the upstairs flat is disrupting Masi's ability to run her shop. Once the landlord agrees to give them access, they discover terrible conditions and a back yard piled with rubbish

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Craig Dawes attends a fatal collision involving a motorcycle and car, where he and Sgt Matt Edwards secure the site for crash investigators, who try to piece together what happened. Sgt Scott Riley spots and follows a biker he thinks looks suspicious, with a computer check indicating the bike is not licensed or insured

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Around 11,000 automatic number plate recognition cameras continually monitor vehicles on Britain's roads. With ANPR readers installed in their patrol cars, it is a valuable tool for Derbyshire's traffic cops, helping them track down dangerous offenders and illegal cars, vans and lorries. Karl Jackson is alerted to a possible disqualified driver when a passing car triggers his ANPR system, but the vehicle fails to stop and a pursuit begins

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dog handler Duncan attends a midnight stand-off between armed officers and a man who has been seen carrying knives, Suggs pulls over a motorist who appears incapable of telling the truth, and Charlie is given the unenviable task of removing a Range Rover from a ditch after a crash

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Charlie and Wayne are in hot pursuit of a van, but the driver crashes the vehicle and runs off into the night. With the help of a tracker, officers hunt down a 17-year-old suspected of committing a serious robbery, while Matt and Brimmers are on the hunt for the driver of a 300,000 Rolls-Royce who is thought to be under the influence

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A high-powered Porsche is pursued by eight police cars and a helicopter, while Officers Ben P and Ben B attend a crash scene where a car has flipped over and landed on its roof, and their difficult job is made harder by a crowd filming the aftermath of the accident on their phones

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.title: 22 Kids & Counting
programme.desc: The Radfords are going on their first holiday for almost two years, with Noel and Sue deciding to take the kids on a tour of the Scottish Highlands, and they're going in convoy, with two camper vans needed to fit everyone in. While they're away, single mum Millie will be in charge at home keeping an eye on her teenage brothers and the four dogs - as well as looking after baby Ophelia

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Farida Ahmad is confronted by a man suffering with tonsillitis who has been vomiting. Urgent care clinician Lizzie treats 12-year-old Naomi, who has a mysterious pea-sized nodule on her cheek. Lizzie is stumped, so calls in Dr Jane Edge for another opinion. Dr Andy Cordell's patient Ray has a strange scaly growth on his upper arm. It gives the GP cause for concern, so he refers Ray to the cancer clinic for an urgent appointment

programme.desc: Documentary examining the rising number of incidents of violence and antisocial behaviour in hospitals, looking at measures implemented by Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham. A sophisticated CCTV system and a private security force of 46 uniformed guards keep staff and patients feeling safe, dealing with everyone from drunks to people with dementia and opportunist thieves

programme.desc: Registrar doctor Chris Carson takes an emergency call when paramedics bring in an 85-year-old woman who has been found choking and is struggling to breathe. Another patient is rushed in by ambulance, and registrar doctor Gemma Hartshorne prepares to treat a man who has suddenly lost all feeling in his foot

programme.title: Inside Broadmoor: Criminally Insane
programme.desc: Documentary charting the history of the high-security psychiatric hospital from the Victorian era to the present day, examining the diverse treatments and regimes that have been applied during the 150 years it has been in operation

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A young girl visits the surgery after hurting her neck when she tried to do a back flip, and doctors treat a first-time mother experiencing excruciating pain in her nipples, Meanwhile, doctors also treat a regular patient who is feeling increasingly depressed after his wife had a miscarriage, and a young woman with suspected irritable bowel syndrome

programme.title: Bargain Brits on Benefits

programme.title: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law

programme.desc: Following a tip-off, Harrow Enforcement officers are shocked to discover an industrial-scale cannabis farm in a house. The team, along with the police, are determined to find out who has been running this illegal operation. After complaints of all-night parties in a quiet street in Darwen, Lancashire, letting agent Paul pays the revellers a visit. The house is in terrible shape, but the young tenants promise they will clear it all up and keep the noise down. Instead, however, the partying gets worse, with some of the tenants' 'associates' making nasty threats

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Andy Swift is on the lookout for a high-value car stolen from a dealership after being taken for a test drive, while he also searches for builder's van taken from a driveway while the owner popped briefly inside to collect his tools and equipment. PC Dave Shaw is patrolling on a night shift when he follows a car suspected of being used in house burglary

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Tom Strachan gives pursuit when a car is spotted by police cameras being driven with no insurance, but when records flag up the suspect has a history of violence, an armed response team is called in too. The suspect throws a knife out of the car and then waves a baseball bat out of his window, banging it on the roof and making offensive hand gestures at the police behind him

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Pursued by a helicopter and a team of armed response vehicles, two men armed with machetes and a sawn-off shotgun make a dramatic escape on a motorbike. Meanwhile, officers Clarkie and Nick take two dangerous boy racers off the road, and a high-speed pursuit of alleged burglars turns into a race on foot

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A suspect assaults Steve with his car keys, leaving the officer in need of urgent medical attention, while Charlie and Paul pursue a motorist who drove off from a garage without paying for fuel. Chris and Sophie spot a bunny-hopping learner driver who already has eight points on his provisional licence

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ben and Matt find themselves on a high-speed chase through the streets of Keighley, while Kev and Spenner assist in a tactical pursuit and containment operation on a suspicious car. On the M62, Charlie and Wayne are heading to a call when a white van drifts into their path, nearly causing them to crash into the central reservation

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: With Barnsley Casualty declared a crime scene, the team have to deal with emergencies inside and outside the hospital. Doctor Dave needs to negotiate with the police

programme.desc: A woman collapses unexpectedly during a day out with her family to an adventure park, and is left unable to move or walk. The trauma team leader diagnoses a bleed on her brain that requires urgent surgery. A neurosurgeon attempts to drain the build-up of fluid in her brain. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team's mission to track the arsonist targeting US Navy facilities appears to end in success when the man in question is killed by a thermite explosion on board the USS Brewer. Meanwhile, Abby studies evidence relating to fire-starter Bruce Johnson, who died when his car exploded, and discovers coded messages in his quarters that indicate he may have been working as part of a larger gang. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The investigators discover probationary agent Ned Dorneget has been bugged by Harper Dearing, the man behind a spate of arson attacks on US Navy vessels. A phone call from the man himself makes it clear he is out for revenge, and Sam Ryan has information as to the motive behind it. Guest starring Richard Schiff (The West Wing)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tries to track down wanted terrorist Harper Dearing before another US Navy ship is destroyed, and a desperate Gibbs enlists the aid of a prisoner to draw his target out of hiding. Meanwhile, Palmer is forced to consider putting his nuptials on hold as the stand-off with Dearing becomes heated. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy tries to prosecute a pilot accused of murdering her married lover for trying to end their relationship, but finds himself battling the Navy and the office of the Judge Advocate General, who seem intent on obstructing his efforts. Acclaimed American detective drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate a seemingly random drive-by shooting, but soon suspect the victim's husband may know more than he is letting on. To make matters worse, the hospital in which the victim was pronounced dead appears to have contributed to her demise - putting a highly respected surgeon's reputation on the line. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis trace a robbery suspect to a militia group, but McCoy is strangely affected by the leader's devotion to his cause - and begins to receive death threats once the case comes to court. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate an attack on a nurse, and discover she had been moving house regularly in an effort to evade a stalker who terrorised her with distressing e-mails. The victim regains consciousness, but fails to identify her attacker, leading to the shocking revelation that she may have fabricated the assault story as a way of attracting attention

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the disappearance of a wealthy couple seemingly snatched from their apartment building, but suspicion eventually falls on a man suffering from mental illness - presenting Ross with a tough ethical decision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach, Benjamin Bratt and Carey Lowell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis and Briscoe question a disabled boy's bereaved family in an attempt to establish whether his death was a mercy killing or cold-blooded murder, and discover his mother is not as respectable as she makes herself out to be. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to the scene of a fatal car crash involving marine lance corporal Chad Dunn and student Lyla Cutwright. Duckie notices that the woman's injuries do not match the specifics of the accident and there are no skidmarks found at the scene, leading Gibbs to declare they possibly have a murder and a suicide on their hands. Abby calls in sick for the first time after the case stirs up a traumatic incident from her childhood. Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette star

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team capture computer hacker Ajay Khan, who was recently responsible for hacking into NCIS's supposedly ultra-secure multiple-threat alert centre. They believe he could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber terrorist in the world, who may be plotting an attack using a bomb containing a strain of the Ebola virus. When Khan refuses to co-operate, Ziva and DiNozzo take him to Guantanamo Bay to be placed with people he had previously betrayed. Guest starring Vik Sahay (Chuck)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a marine who dropped dead while scaling a wall on an assault course, and a fellow soldier reveals that he was heavily involved with an underground fight club, where competitors would battle for cash. Meanwhile, having returned to work after compassionate leave, Vance discovers paperwork and a key in his late wife's effects that lead him to a safety deposit box containing a stash of cash

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: When a leading financial advisor is shot dead at a naval station, NCIS investigates by interviewing the victim's 3D hologram of herself, which she created before her death

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler's investigation of a robbery leads to his troubled daughter, who broke into a couple's home to use their shower. As he digs deeper into her college life he discovers she has been regularly using drugs and he becomes determined to find and arrest her dealer, and to help her he is forced to reconnect with his estranged mother. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson investigate the death of an astronaut whose body is discovered in the Hudson River. They identify two chief suspects - a drug addict who used the murdered woman's credit card and a man who was barred from the space programme after fighting with the victim. However, a shooting at the precinct jeopardises the detectives' chances of solving the case. Crime drama, guest starring James Brolin, with Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Lake team up with FBI agent Lauren Cooper to track down a serial killer who has claimed the lives of more than 20 women - but discover that he too has been murdered. The investigation leads them to a warehouse where they find a hidden torture chamber containing a surviving victim - but she later dies, shutting down a vital line of inquiry and complicating the case still further

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A violent sexual assault on a boy draws Benson and Stabler into a culture clash between Orthodox Jews and the secular authorities - but the investigation ultimately leads them to a 14-year-old with a penchant for preying on younger children. Starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A banking associate is found murdered, and inquiries reveal he was having an affair with his high-powered boss, who seemingly killed him in a rage. The police build a prosecution case, but it hinges on testimony from the suspect's traumatised teenage daughter - whose delicate mental state makes McCoy uncertain how to proceed

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An assistant district attorney is kidnapped during an investigation into a home invasion that left four members of the same family murdered. However, a further killing prompts McCoy to put his career on the line to track down the culprits. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Annie Parisse

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. As rescue crews sift through the debris searching for survivors, Abby, Gibbs, McGee and Vance are accounted for, but Ziva and Tony are trapped in a lift. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate the death of an armoury employee when divers find her body in a car at the bottom of a lake. The victim had been reported missing since she was evacuated before the blast at NCIS headquarters. Meanwhile, crisis counsellor Miles Wolf carries out psychological assessments of all the agents in the wake of the bombings. Guest starring Steve Valentine (Crossing Jordan)

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Baltimore detectives Munch and Falsone head for pastures new, travelling to New York to aid the investigation into the death of a teenage model, while McCoy has a fight on his hands with the attorney representing the victim's parents. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Richard Belzer and Jon Seda, with Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The parents of a baby given up for adoption could provide a clue to the death of a new mother - but the investigation also turns up long-buried family secrets. The detectives are forced to consider the possibility that racial prejudice played a part in the case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy tries to trap a crooked lawyer who bribes his clients - but as he tries to track down the man's accomplice, he realises the investigation has placed his own job on the line. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A female cop is found stabbed to death in a park alongside a Hispanic male with a near-fatal gunshot wound. Further investigations lead Briscoe and Curtis to a girl who suffered a tough childhood in the care of an abusive father and drug-addicted mother, and her alibi appears to be flimsy at best. Robert Vaughn guest stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A newly appointed judge is knocked over and killed while trying to escape from the tabloid journalist who has been harassing her. The team is all set to press charges against the reporter, but it soon becomes clear there is more to the case than meets the eye. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While transporting the corpse of Lt Gordon Roth to the morgue, a flat tyre brings Ducky and Jimmy to a halt and they are abducted and taken to a remote cabin - where one of their captors wants the post-mortem to take place. Back at the scene, Abby finds a blood sample that does not belong to the victim, who in fact bore little resemblance to the picture of Roth in his old school yearbook. Guest starring Valerie Cruz (The Following)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is stabbed to death after stepping out of her shower, becoming the latest victim of the Dead Rose Slasher. Gibbs is approached by his old friend and barber Frankie Dean, who shares his concern that his son Cameron may be the killer. He explains that a photo-fit released to the media resembles him, and the attacks stopped during a period coinciding with his three-year stint in the navy. Meanwhile, Tony has to take probationary agent Ned Dorneget under his wing

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Marine sergeant Teddy Lemere is killed by a sniper in Afghanistan just after his sniffer dog helps guide a young child out of a minefield. Back in the US, his widow Ruby tells Gibbs and the team that she had recently received a message from her husband saying he might have upset a few people. Abby retrieves a tiny shard of the sniper's bullet from Ted's helmet and finds that it was made in America

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a web of secrets

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: An expert poker player takes up a job collecting debts for a bookmaker he owes money to. After being given a gun containing blanks and a list of debtors he begins collecting, but on his second assignment his weapon fires a live round and kills a man in the middle of the street. Goren and Eames get the task of finding out who was ultimately responsible for the killing. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives call on the help of Dr Warner when the death of a baby leads Stabler and Benson to crack down on a doctor who claims that Aids does not exist and whose dubious practices have cost several lives. Guest starring Babs Olusanmokun (The Unit, Life on Mars)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Munch investigate when a homeless teenager is found burned to death outside a restaurant. The victim's father tells them there could be a link with some violent videos uploaded to the internet, so the team sets up a sting operation which eventually leads them to the same school the dead man had attended - and two groups of girls who are very single-minded

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A number of fertilised embryos are stolen from a sperm bank and the team's investigation reveals several unhappy customers - as well as a couple of outspoken anti-fertility activists who liken such clinics to death camps. Before long, Benson and Stabler have their suspects in custody - but a shocking turn of events at the courthouse turns the case into a murder. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Green and Cassady try to solve the murder of a Muslim man at the hands of a white supremacist group, following a trail of clues that leads to the victim's cousin, who is seemingly connected to a terrorist cell operating in New York. With little evidence to go on, the detectives struggle to find enough information to close the case and stop a potential attack in the city. Crime drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Milena Govich

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man is found bludgeoned to death in the back seat of a tour bus used by the crew of a film called Babes Being Bad. The detectives suspect that the producer and a colleague took advantage of a woman, leading her to accidentally kill the victim in self-defence. Crime drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Milena Govich

programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An answering machine message leads Briscoe and Curtis to reopen an investigation into an arson attack that killed a girl - but the 15-year-old suspect has a powerful ally in his grandfather, an influential force in political spheres. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Robert Vaughn (Hustle) alongside Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a Middle Eastern man sends Briscoe and Curtis racing to thwart a suspected terrorist plot to bring destruction to New York - and leads them to uncover a domestic conspiracy involving horrific female circumcision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy faces bad memories when a drunk driver kills three people - and finds himself forced to protect the perpetrator in the process. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Paramedics become suspicious about a baby's death, calling in Briscoe and Curtis, who discover the parents adopted the child from an illegal Russian ring. The case takes on another dimension altogether when it transpires that the crooks specialise in placing terminally ill infants with unsuspecting families. Starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Carmichael have the unenviable task of prosecuting three police officers with a racially motivated hate crime that threatens to cause uproar in the city. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Angie Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A narcotics detective plans a major drugs sting but makes the mistake of illegally using a teenager as bait - with fatal consequences. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New Mossad director Orli Elbaz asks for the team's help in finding Ilan Bodnar when one of her agents is shot dead in Virginia, telling Gibbs he was investigating several operatives who had gone rogue after Eli David's death. Ziva travels with Tony to Berlin in her pursuit of Bodnar, the man she believes was responsible for the death of her father. Guest starring Marina Sirtis (Star Trek: The Next Generation)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tracks Bodnar's SUV to a remote house in the countryside, but inside find only his dead accomplice - identified as a South African mercenary who helped Bodnar procure diamonds. Ziva and Tony, meanwhile, discharge themselves from hospital and wheedle information out of Abby to continue investigating on the quiet, having been warned by Homeland Security to stay off the case

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The remains of several bodies are found buried in the ocean floor off the Florida coast, and as the team investigates further, Morgan is shaken by the thought that one of the victims could be his missing cousin. Crime drama, starring Shemar Moore

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU discovers two bodies in the boot of a car and an agent faces a life-threatening situation during the hunt for the leader of a human-trafficking ring

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A dead bird is found in a murdered model's bag, leading the detectives to believe it is a coded Mob message, but as they investigate further, her sister believes a rapper called Gots Money is responsible for the crime. However, when tiger saliva is discovered on the victim's body, Stabler is forced to go undercover to confront a former people trafficker who is now involved in the exotic animal trade. Crime drama, guest starring Caitlin Fitzgerald and Outkast singer Antwan Andre Patton

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims to have been raped by a stranger to hide the fact she is a victim of domestic abuse, but later admits that her husband has been beating her because she does not want children with him. While conducting inquiries, Benson stumbles on a shockingly similar case involving the victim's elderly neighbour. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover in a prison to investigate a teenage girl's claims that a guard raped her and has been threatening her jailed mother. Posing as an inmate, she tries to find evidence that systematic abuse is taking place - and faces a terrifying ordeal in the basement of the facility. Starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A corrections officer is arrested, accused of sexually assaulting his female charges both inside the prison system and beyond. programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: The PWA World Tour
programme.desc: We meet some of the world's top professional windsurfers as they slalom their way through the Sea of Galilee in Israel in this showcase event

programme.title: The World's Most Extraordinary Families
programme.desc: What exactly makes a family in today's often complex world? Each episode features three unique families from around the world who live their lives in a less than conventional way

programme.title: Dance With Me, Henry (1956)
programme.desc: The owners of a struggling amusement park get mixed up with the Mob as one struggles to pay his debts and the other faces losing his adopted kids. Comedy, with Abbott and Costello

programme.title: Time Limit (1957)
programme.desc: A soldier held as a POW during the Korean War confesses to having assisted the enemy during his imprisonment. His superior officers are determined to see him face a court martial as soon as possible, but the investigator assigned to the case suspects he is an innocent man incriminating himself to hide something. Korean War drama, with Richard Widmark and Richard Basehart

programme.title: Big City Life
programme.desc: The lives of three artistic brothers, a drummer, a sculpture and a DJ

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: A journey of discovery to a wonderful world of breath-taking views and endangered species, with each episode focusing on one animal and its lifestyle, needs and habitat

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William is distraught to learn his mother has suffered a serious stroke, and rushes to the nursing home to see her, arriving just before she dies. Admitting their relationship was not always a happy one, he resolves nevertheless to give her a send-off she would be proud off - only to receive shocking news at the reading of her will. Elsewhere, Molly strives to make amends with Mary, but she has enough to worry about in the form of a teenage girl about to give birth. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Six believes he can taste freedom - but this could be yet another trick. Conclusion of the cult sci-fi drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Guppy reveals to Lady Dedlock that he may acquire some old Hawdon letters. Adaptation of Charles Dickens' novel from 1985, starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: Buster (1988)
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about the life of Buster Edwards, a member of the gang responsible for the Great Train Robbery. Going on the run after the notorious heist, he flees to Mexico with his family. However, his homesick wife struggles to adapt to her new life, leaving the outlaw with a difficult choice. Starring Phil Collins, Julie Walters, Sheila Hancock, Larry Lamb and Ralph Brown

programme.title: Private Road (1971)
programme.desc: A woman suffering from depression and a gifted writer take their first steps into adult life together. Romantic drama, starring Susan Penhaligon and Bruce Robinson

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Guppy reveals to Lady Dedlock that he may acquire some old Hawdon letters. Adaptation of Charles Dickens' novel from 1985, starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures (2006)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. When their daughter's hostile behaviour and the authorities' lack of support become too much to handle, the couple decide to commit suicide together, writing a letter to a local newspaper to explain the reasons behind their actions. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: A swindle is revealed when the Baron negotiates the sale of a fabulous treasure on behalf of a foreign king. Sixties drama about the antics of antiques expert and part-time adventurer John Mannering, starring Steve Forrest, Sue Lloyd, Colin Gordon and Paul Ferriss II

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Monroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of the amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ling lures Ang and Xuan to the Tiger Temple, where the Snake Guardian is bitten by a huge king cobra

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mannering is delighted when he buys a valuable Samurai sword - but the owner's family are angered when they hear of the transaction. Sixties drama, starring Steve Forrest

programme.title: Bleak House
programme.desc: Guppy reveals to Lady Dedlock that he may acquire some old Hawdon letters. Adaptation of Charles Dickens' novel from 1985, starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Reluctant hero Monkey is accused of murdering a girl and her family, leaving Tripitaka with no choice but to send him home _ but it later emerges that demons are responsible for his plight

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: An alien claiming to be the 'creator' offers to make a new Garden of Eden on Earth for the Alphans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: The Bromley Boys (2018)
programme.desc: In 1969, with England preparing for the defence of their World Cup crown, 15-year-old David Roberts falls in love with his local non-league club, Bromley FC. While trying to enter the inner sanctum of the club's most loyal fans, David embarks on a seemingly sham relationship with the chairman's daughter, Ruby. Comedy, starring Brenock O'Connor and Jamie Foreman

programme.title: Silent Dust (1949)
programme.desc: A wealthy blind man plans a memorial to his dead son, only to discover he is still alive and has turned to crime. Drama, starring Stephen Murray and Beatrice Campbell

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Animal lover Eilish has been feeding the stray cats in her garden during lockdown, and contacts the clinic when she notices the health of one of them is beginning to deteriorate

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Brittas takes charge of preparations for the official opening of Whitbury Leisure Center, with a royal visitor due to attend. Sadly, the builders dislike him so much they don't bother to tell him that the brand new pool is leaking. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Featuring Lee, Bermondsey and Stratford. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: The Hidden City
programme.desc: Drama following a group of young homeless people living in the streets of London for one year

programme.title: The Steal (1994)
programme.desc: An American computer expert arrives in London to execute a hi-tech robbery from a bank whose chief executive has a hand in many dodgy deals. Crime comedy, starring Helen Slater, Peter Bowles, Alfred Molina, Stephen Fry and Jack Dee

programme.title: Rise of the Krays (2015)
programme.desc: Biopic of the gangster brothers, exploring their formative years. Twins Ronnie and Reggie begin their criminal career as 18-year-old amateur boxers, and rapidly rise to become the most feared gang leaders in the London underworld, their brutal excesses observed by a close friend. Starring Kevin Leslie, Simon Cotton and Nicola Stapleton

programme.title: Strike It Lucky
programme.desc: Michael Barrymore hosts the madcap game show, in which three teams of two prove seek to progress along a board game-style path by answering questions. Each duo are allowed to determine how many spaces they would like to move by answering the corresponding number of questions. Landing on a space reveals it's hidden contents, which could amount to a prize, or a 'hot spot', which causes contestants to forfeit their gathered winnings
